title: Cheesy bacon and potato soup
ingredients: ['500ml chicken stock', '4 large potatoes, diced', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '2 carrots, chopped', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1 litre milk', '350g Kraft processed cheese slices, unwrapped and chopped', '4 tablespoons instant mash granules or flakes', '4 rashers streaky bacon, cooked and crumbled']
